long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥 ⭐️ 80k+ ⭐️ Best AI Assistant From Github, Quick & Local-Focused AI Copilot.

https://github.com/ChatGPTNextWeb/ChatGPT-Next-Web

NextChat offers assistance in various tasks including searching, reading, writing, translating, drawing, and more.

💪 The Key Features:
👉 Chat with AI
✔️ Multi chatbots support: chat with different LLM models such as OpenAI-o1, GPT-4o, Gemini-1.5, Claude-3.5, Claude-Instant, all in one place.
✔️ Prompt Library: a prompt base that offers a large number of prompts; just hit '/' to quickly access your saved prompts.
✔️ Real-Time Web Access: NextChat can answer with the latest internet info.
✔️ Voice Input and Output Support: using microphone button to communicate with the AI in multiple languages.
👉 Chat and Summary
✔️ ChatPDF: upload a PDF and chat with PDF to better understand the content and quickly grasp the core highlight.
✔️ Chat With Image: take a screenshot or upload an image and ask questions based on the content of the image, powered by GPT-4V.
✔️ Webpage Summary: get accurate summaries without having to read entire webpage articles or information.
👉 Search
✔️ Search Agent: just ask a question, and NextChat can search using multiple keywords, review all the results, and find the right answer for you.
✔️ Search Enhance: load ChatGPT answers next to search tools like Google and new Bing.
👉 Write
✔️ Compose: to create content like essays, reports, or ad copy, use "compose" to quickly generate customized paragraphs, adjusting length, format, tone, and language.
✔️ Write agent: just provide a topic, and NextChat can automatically draft outlines for you, expanding the content with references.
✔️ Email reply: in Gmail, NextChat analyzes emails content and suggests reply options, enabling you to send appropriate responses with just a click, no typing needed.
👉 Translation
✔️ PDF Translation: translate a PDF file and compare it side by side with the original file on the left and the translated file on the right.
✔️ Parallel Translation: translate the current page information without covering the original text, so that both language versions can be compared to obtain accurate answers.
✔️ Text Translation: select any text on any webpage to get accurate translation results in NextChat.
👉 Creating Art
Convert your words into visuals. Just enter a short text, and you can become a painter.

💻 How to use NextChat:
🔸 Click the "Add to Chrome" button in the upper right corner and pin it to the toolbar for easy access.
🔸 Log in to your NextChat account.
🔸 Press Option|Alt+N to wake up NextChat.
🔸 Start working with NextChat!
❓ Frequently Asked Questions:
📌 What search engines are supported by NextChat?
Currently, we support search engines such as Google and Bing, and will support more search engines in the future.
📌 Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
No, you do not need to have a ChatGPT account to use this extension. You can create a NextChat account for free at https://nextchat.dev.
📌 My country bans ChatGPT. Can I use NextChat in my country?
Yes, NextChat's chrome extension can be used in all countries.
📌 Can I use NextChat on my phone?
Yes, NextChat is available on all devices (Chrome Extension, Edge Extension, Mac OS, Windows, iOS, Android).
📌 Is NextChat free?
Yes, NextChat offers limited free usage. For unlimited access, you can choose the Premium Plan.

📪 Contact us:
Any questions or suggestions? Please contact us at 💌 business@nextchat.dev.
Try NextChat now and experience the powerful features of an AI assistant driven by ChatGPT!
long.zh_CN:
🔥  ⭐️ 80k+ ⭐️ Best AI Assistant From Github, Quick & Local-Focused AI Copilot.
NextChat 提供多种任务帮助，包括搜索、阅读、写作、翻译、绘图等。

💪 主要功能：
👉 与 AI 聊天
✔️ 支持多个聊天机器人：在一个地方与 OpenAI-o1、GPT-4o、Gemini-1.5、Claude-3.5、Claude-Instant 等不同的大型语言模型聊天。
✔️ 提示库：提供大量提示，只需点击 '/' 即可快速访问保存的提示。
✔️ 实时网络访问：NextChat 可以提供最新的互联网信息。
✔️ 支持语音输入和输出：使用麦克风按钮用多种语言与 AI 交流。
👉 聊天与摘要
✔️ ChatPDF：上传 PDF 文件并与之对话，更好地理解内容并迅速把握重点。
✔️ 图像聊天：上传截图或图片，并根据图片内容提问，由 GPT-4V 提供支持。
✔️ 网页摘要：无需阅读整个网页文章或信息即可获得准确摘要。
👉 搜索
✔️ 搜索代理：提出问题，NextChat 可以使用多个关键词搜索，审查所有结果并找到正确答案。
✔️ 搜索增强：在搜索工具如 Google 和新 Bing 旁边加载 ChatGPT 回答。
👉 写作
✔️ 组合：使用“组合”功能快速生成定制段落，可调整长度、格式、语气和语言，以创造内容如文章、报告或广告文案。
✔️ 写作代理：提供一个主题，NextChat 可以自动为您草拟大纲，并扩展内容与参考。
✔️ 邮件回复：在 Gmail 中，NextChat 分析电子邮件内容并建议回复选项，使您可以一键发送适当的回应，无需键入。
👉 翻译
✔️ PDF 翻译：翻译 PDF 文件，并将原文件和翻译文件并排比较。
✔️ 平行翻译：翻译当前页面信息，不覆盖原文，以便比较两种语言版本以获得准确答案。
✔️ 文本翻译：选择任何网页上的文本以获取准确的翻译结果。
👉 创造艺术
将您的文字转换成视觉图像。只需输入简短文本，即可成为画家。

💻 如何使用 NextChat：
🔸 在右上角点击“添加到 Chrome”按钮，并将其固定到工具栏以便于访问。
🔸 登录您的 NextChat 账户。
🔸 按 Option|Alt+N 唤醒 NextChat。
🔸 开始使用 NextChat！

❓ 常见问题解答：
📌 NextChat 支持哪些搜索引擎？
目前，我们支持Google、Bing等搜索引擎，将来还会支持更多搜索引擎。
📌 我需要 ChatGPT/OpenAI 账户吗？
不，您无需拥有 ChatGPT 账户即可使用此扩展。您可以在 https://nextchat.dev 免费创建 NextChat 账户。
📌 我的国家禁止 ChatGPT。我可以在我的国家使用 NextChat 吗？
是的，NextChat 的 Chrome 扩展可以在所有国家使用。
📌 我可以在手机上使用 NextChat 吗？
是的，NextChat 支持所有设备（Chrome 扩展、Edge 扩展、Mac OS、Windows、iOS、Android）。
📌 NextChat 是免费的吗？
是的，NextChat 提供有限的免费使用。如需无限访问，您可以选择高级计划。

📪 联系我们：
有任何问题或建议？请通过 💌 business@nextchat.dev 联系我们。
立即尝试 NextChat，体验由 ChatGPT 驱动的 AI 助手的强大功能！
